title: Video: Run, WALK! – Straight Lines
body:
If you thought that bass/drum two-pieces began and ended with **DFA ’79**, this latest take from Winchester based ‘intense death drone’ duo **[Run, WALK!](http://runwalk.tumblr.com/ "Run, WALK! Tumblr")** will leave you cowering in a corner, and enthusiastically revising your views. Watching this band grow and develop over the years has been an absolute pleasure, and as the grainy, monochrome video for the frankly terrifying _Straight Lines_ proves, **Run, WALK!** continue to take absolutely no fucking prisoners.

The video for **Run, WALK!**‘s _Straight Lines_ debuted today on [DIY](http://www.thisisfakediy.co.uk/articles/videos/premiere-run-walk-straight-lines "Wish we'd got there first. Bugger."). You can preorder the band’s split with New York punks **[Sirs](http://topshelfrecords.com/tsr2/_pages/artist_sirs.php "Yessirs")** at [Holy Roar](http://holyroarrecords.tumblr.com/post/9832043750/co-release-between-holy-roar-and-topshelf "Holy Phwoar!").
